GSD.description:
ext4: don't BUG if someone dirty pages without asking ext4 first

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.189 by commit 5a016c053f426a73752c3b41b60b497b58694d48. For more details please see the references link.
